programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.sub-title: 2024-2025: Golden State Warriors at Denver Nuggets
programme.desc: Nikola Jokic had 38 points, 10 rebounds and five steals to rally the Nuggets to a 119-115 victory over the Warriors. Jokic fell four assists shy of his NBA-leading ninth triple-double of the season. From Dec. 3, 2024.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.sub-title: 2024-2025: Atlanta Hawks at San Antonio Spurs
programme.desc: Victor Wembanyama scored eight of his 42 points in overtime and the San Antonio Spurs outlasted the Atlanta Hawks, 133-126. Wembanyama was 13 for 24 from the field, going 7 of 15 on 3-pointers. He also had six rebounds, five assists and two steals.
